articles.author: Phil Mayer
articles.title: Power outage affects nearly 9,000 in San Francisco - KRON4
articles.description: SAN FRANCISCO (KRON) — Nearly 9,000 PG&E customers lost power in San Francisco Friday night, PG&E’s outage map showed. The entirety of Golden Gate Park was affected by the outage, as well as areas of the Sunset District and Lower Haight. Power was restored to…

articles.title: Falling yen making Japan a precipitously poorer place - Asia Times
articles.description: Japan’s terms of trade – the price of exports relative to the price of imports – worsened for nine consecutive quarters after the second quarter of 2020.

articles.title: The dollar has declined for three consecutive days and gold is beginning to respond - Kitco NEWS
articles.description: (Kitco commentary) - The dollar is now in its third consecutive day of trading lower. The dollar hit its highest value of 107.05 on Tuesday, October 3. This is the highest value of the index and almost a year.
